name: Twity
intro: Web3.0 advertising and marketing service agency
introduce: Twity is a web3.0 advertising and marketing service agency, creates simpler and more effective marketing options for web3 brands. Committed to solving the marketing problems of web3 projects, Twity exclusively developed the Promofi system, allowing users not only become audiences of advertisements, but also truly participate in the marketing process and enjoy the benefits of marketing campaign.
